# portrait

**Type Property**

The device is in portrait mode, with the top of the device on top.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor static var portrait: PreviewTrait<Preview.ViewTraits> { get }
```

## Discussion

This is the same as [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/SwiftUI/InterfaceOrientation/portrait] and is the default orientation if you don’t specify one.
title: portrait
